creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Very large tea (NOt coffee) pot (part of tea service), oval urn-shape on hight foot with shaped outline; domed lid with plain knob finial; around shoulder an applied silver band chased with alternating groups of saw-tooth, floral andlozenge pattern; set-in round medallion of silver with border of chased reciprocal saw-tooth pattern enclosing monogram <F.M. Reeding> on rim and loose lid; wooden handle
title: Teapot from a tea set
